Would someone *please* find RK Saitou and send him over to me ASAP?  I desperately need a cigarette!!!!!!!  Unless you're a smoker, you cannot imagine how difficult it is to go through the RK manga after you've run out and no prospect for more for hours to come --- I swear Saitou just conjures them out of the air... or like he has some kind of magic pack that replenishes itself.  The number of cigarettes he just tosses aside after he's just lit it... I could smack him for that!!  So sad to sit here and stare at all those unsmoked cigarettes... ;-)
 
phil (wondering how expensive cigarettes were in Japan at the time... how long they were available only as import... assuming that Japan eventually did create it's own, but maybe not... hmmm....)
